entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010%%00010md = {%%00010%%00009'org' : [],%%00010%%00009'zdrojova_data': [],%%00010%%00009'ds_nazev' : [],%%00010%%00009'ds_url' : [],%%00010%%00009'resource' : [],%%00010%%00009'roky' : [],%%00010%%00009'tags' : [], %%00010%%00009'indikator' : [],%%00010%%00009'popis' : [],%%00010%%00009'licence' : [],%%00010%%00009'keywords' : [],%%00010%%00009'last_update':[],%%00010%%00009'url_zdroj': []%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00010#z metadat konkretne%%00010md['ds_nazev'].append(flow_variables['ds_nazev'])%%00010%%00010last_update = flow_variables['context.workflow.last.time.modified'].strip()%%00010md['last_update'].append(last_update)%%00010%%00010md['org'].append(flow_variables['org_url'])%%00010%%00010time = [min(input_table['Year']), max(input_table['Year'])]%%00010md['roky'].append('{0} - {1}'.format(time[0], time[-1]))%%00010%%00010md['keywords'].append(", ".join(input_table['IPCC sector'].unique()))%%00010%%00010zdrojova_data = flow_variables['url_ckan'].split("?id=")[-1]%%00010md['zdrojova_data'].append(zdrojova_data)%%00010%%00010ds_url = flow_variables['csv'].split("/")[-1]%%00010ds_url = ds_url.replace(".csv","").replace("Data_","").replace("_","-")%%00010md['ds_url'].append(ds_url.lower())%%00010%%00010data_resource = flow_variables['csv'].split("/")[-1]%%00010md['resource'].append(data_resource)%%00010%%00010md['popis'].append('')%%00010md['url_zdroj'].append(flow_variables['url_zdroj'])%%00010%%00010%%00010#doplnit missing%%00010mdMax = max(len(v) for v in md.values())%%00010for k, v in md.items():%%00010%%00009if len(v) < mdMax:%%00010%%00009%%00009v.extend(None for x in range(mdMax - len(v)))%%00010%%00010output_table = pd.DataFrame(md)%%00010%%00010flow_variables['metadata'] = flow_variables['csv'].replace("Data_", "metadata_")
